item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - Claire Richards - Euphoria (End Of Time Edition + You And I Edition)
item.description:
This post is only for the Extra Tracks for these editions as the main album is the same as the standard deluxe which can be found here https://sharemania.us/threads/claire-richards-euphoria-deluxe-edition.226970/#post-4811478

Euphoria - You And I Edition Deluxe

20-Euphoria (Live At Eurovision Village, Liverpool)
21-I Surrender (Orchestral Mix)
22-Summer Night City (Claire Solo Version)
23-Never Knew Love Like This Before (Sudlow Remix)
24-Song For The Lonely (Steve Anderson Extended Mix)
25-Euphoria (7th Heaven Radio Edit)
26-Summer Night City (Steve Anderson Extended Mix) (with Andy Bell)
27-Gloria (JRMX Radio Edit)
28-Summer Night City (7th Heaven Radio Edit) (with Andy Bell)
29-Euphoria (JRMX Radio Edit)
30-I Surrender (Radio Edit)
LINK:
Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
Euphoria - End Of Time Edition Deluxe

20-So Emotional (La Flex Retro Mix)
21-Summer Night City (Trouser Enthusiasts Remix) (with Andy Bell)
22-Never Trust A Stranger (Shortland Remix)
23-Euphoria (7th Heaven Club Mix)
24-This Time I Know It's For Real (Shortland Remix)
25-No More Tears (Enough Is Enough) (Sudlow Remix) (with Delta Goodrem)
26-I Surrender (7th Heaven Club Mix)
27-Gloria (JRMX Club Mix)
28-Song For The Lonely (7th Heaven Club Mix)
29-Euphoria (JRMX Club Remix)
30-Summer Night City (7th Heaven Club Mix) (with Andy Bell)
